title: LF 5's Casual Group / Team
body:
Looking for a group of 5's to play with, don't mind if the group plays norms or ranked.
Would also be great if the group branched out to lay other games / mmo's.
Rank: Plat V
Main: Mid / Support
Age: 18
Comm: Skype / TeamSpeak

Add me at Neopixalite.
When added please message me about the post, if I'm afk note me please.

replies.body: I can add for normals, but im a pleb so :3 dunno if that's an issue
